dcterms:description: The Replica dataset is a collection of 18 highly detailed 3D indoor scenes, designed for advancing research in various machine learning and computer vision areas. These scenes are visually realistic and offer comprehensive data including dense meshes, high-quality HDR textures, and detailed semantic information for each element.
dcterms:title: Replica

dcterms:creator: A. Pumarola
E. Corona
G. Pons-Moll
F. Moreno-Noguer
dcterms:description: D-NeRF is a dataset that includes videos with 50 to 200 frames each, captured from unique viewpoints. It features synthetic, animated objects in complex scenes, with non-Lambertian materials, providing training and test images designed for evaluating models in monocular settings with varied camera poses.
dcterms:title: D-NeRF

dcterms:creator: H. Caesar
V. Bankiti
A. H. Lang
S. Vora
V. E. Liong
Q. Xu
A. Krishnan
Y. Pan
G. Baldan
O. Beijbom
dcterms:description: nuScenes is a comprehensive collection for autonomous driving research, featuring 1000 driving scenes captured using an array of sensors including six cameras, one LiDAR, five RADARs, GPS, and IMU. It provides detailed annotations for 23 object classes with 3D bounding boxes.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: S. Peng

Y. Xu
Q. Wang
Q. Shuai
H. Bao
X. Zhou
dcterms:description: ZJU-MoCap is a prevalent benchmark in human modeling from videos, captured with 23 synchronized cameras at a 1024Ã—1024 resolution. It is used for evaluating models that generate human avatars from multi-view video data.
dcterms:title: ZJU-MoCap
